scientific_robustness.1-2: Weak theoretical basis; limited citations; narrow impact
scientific_robustness.3-4: Sound principles; moderate citations; incremental novelty
scientific_robustness.5-6: Solid foundation; good citation history; clear technical contribution
scientific_robustness.7-8: Strong fundamentals; highly cited; influenced later work
scientific_robustness.9-10: Foundational; seminal work; extensive impact on field

manufacturing_feasibility.1-2: Requires highly specialized equipment; exotic materials; yield unpredictable
manufacturing_feasibility.3-4: Specialized equipment; difficult sourcing; complex control
manufacturing_feasibility.5-6: Standard equipment; available materials; moderate process complexity
manufacturing_feasibility.7-8: Common equipment; commodity materials; well-understood process
manufacturing_feasibility.9-10: Off-the-shelf equipment; standard materials; simple, repeatable process

modernization_potential.1-2: Requires fundamental redesign; incompatible with modern tech
modernization_potential.3-4: Significant adaptation needed; partial legacy compatibility
modernization_potential.5-6: Moderate updates required; can integrate with modern systems
modernization_potential.7-8: Minor updates needed; readily compatible with current tech
modernization_potential.9-10: Native compatibility; natural fit with Industry 4.0, automation, IoT
